gurmukhi: ਮਨ ਮਧੁਕਰਿ ਗਤਿ ਭ੍ਰਮਤ ਚਤੁਰ ਕੁੰਟ ਚਰਨ ਕਮਲ ਸੁਖ ਸੰਪਟ ਸਮਾੲੀਅੈ
transliteration: Man Madhoukari Gati Bhramat Chatur Kounta , Charan Kamal Soukh Sanpat Samaaeeai ?
translation: The mind wanders like a bumble bee in all four directions. But by coming into the refuge of True Guru and by the blessings of Naam Simran, he merges into peace and comfort of equipoise.

gurmukhi: ਸੀਤਲ ਸੁਗੰਧ ਅਤਿ ਕੋਮਲ ਅਨੂਪ ਰੂਪ ਮਧੁ ਮਕਰੰਦ ਤਸ ਅਨਤ ਨ ਧਾੲੀਅੈ
transliteration: Seetal Sougandh Ati Komal Anoop Roopa , Madhu Makarand Tas Anat N Dhaaeeai ?
translation: Once the calming, scented, delicate and very beautiful elixir-like holy dust of the feet of True Guru is received, the mind does not wander in any direction.

gurmukhi: ਸਹਜ ਸਮਾਧਿ ੳੁਨਮਨ ਜਗਮਗ ਜੋਤਿ ਅਨਹਦ ਧੁਨਿ ਰੁਨਝੁਨ ਲਿਵ ਲਾੲੀਅੈ
transliteration: Sahaj Samaadhi Ounaman Jagamag Joti , Anahad Dhouni Rounajhoun Liv Laaeeai ?
translation: On account of his association with the holy feet of the True Guru, by remaining in a state of divine will and tranquil state of meditation and ever enjoying a glimpse of the light effulgent, he remains engrossed in the melodious unstruck celestial music.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਬੀਸ ੲਿਕੀਸ ਸੋਹੰ ਸੋੲੀ ਜਾਨੈ ਅਾਪਾ ਅਪਰੰਪਰ ਪਰਮਪਦੁ ਪਾੲੀਅੈ ॥੨੨੨॥
transliteration: Gurmukhi Bees Ikees Sohan Soee Jaanai , Aapaa Aparanpar Paramapadu Paaeeai ?222?
translation: Believe it! An obedient Sikh of the True Guru becomes aware of the One Lord who is beyond all limits. And thus he reaches the supreme spiritual state. (222)
